channel.title: Please read and try to help me out
channel.description: Hello everyone, now this may seem stupid to most of you, so I would like to take this oppurtunity to ask you to please not insult me. I'm trying to re-colour a weapon on Metasquoia. I can't seem to get any of the .dat files into it. I click open, then search in the RSMV file I have, it doesn't show any of the .dats and I haven't a clue how to import them. I was thinking of changing it to.mqo, but I don't want to mess up. Could anyone please try to help and tell me if it's wrong to change it to .mqo? :confused:

item.title: Please read and try to help me out

meh who cares about the section… I think its just a simple recolor

Read full topic

item.title: Please read and try to help me out
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello everyone, now this may seem stupid to most of you, so I would like to take this oppurtunity to ask you to please not insult me.
I’m trying to re-colour a weapon on Metasquoia. I can’t seem to get any of the .dat files into it.
I click open, then search in the RSMV file I have, it doesn’t show any of the .dats
and I haven’t a clue how to import them.
I was thinking of changing it to.mqo, but I don’t want to mess up.
Could anyone please try to help and tell me if it’s wrong to change it to .mqo?

Read full topic
